about_the_game:
Crownless Abyss is a fantasy turn-based roguelite dungeon crawler about exploring the treacherous depths of the ocean in a search for a divine relic to restore the world.



The catastrophic rain came without warning. The human world crumbled, and a deadly plague swept the land. Humanity took refuge under the ocean, said to have been blessed by the goddess, where the plague can not follow. The church’s archives mention a divine relic powerful enough to cure and restore the world, resting deep in the ocean.

Led by the Archbishop, an expedition party was formed...

PLUNGE INTO THE ABYSS

Descend into the abyssal depths of the ocean filled with secrets and danger. Traverse through various environments of the abyss in a mission to restore the world.


TURN-BASED COMBAT

Face and overcome the monstrosities lurking in the abyss in a turn-based battle system. Make efficient use of each turn and strategize to obtain victory.


ROGUE-LITE ELEMENTS

The ever-changing layout of the abyss offers new experiences and surprises with each expedition. Gain character skills, find powerful equipment, and encounter various events as you navigate your way through the abyss. Unlock permanent upgrades at the base to strengthen your characters.


DEEPEN BONDS WITH ALLIES

Interact with your allies, build strong relationships and trust, and learn more about their background and origins.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 / Windows 8.1
  • Processor: AMD A4-6300 / Intel Pentium G870
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6750 / Nvidia GeForce GT 640 / Intel UHD 620
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 Bit 44.1 Khz
